page.title: 19 Farms
page.content: There are 18 farms in our area.Not all of them are farms .One hires out farm machinery. {Skates Farm Skates Farm is a small farm owned by Mr. Munday.Most of his land is rough grazing and he uses just 3 fields for 7 horses 30 sheep and a herd of cows, they feed most of their crops to the animals. Mr.Munday employs one person and his son helps sometimes. {Ravenscot Farm. Ravenscot Farm is owned by Mr.Munday .It is 200 acres.It is a Dairy Farm,he has 100 cattle and 60 sheep.He uses 15 fields for them.The milk he gets from the cows goes to the Milk Marketing Board. He has 4 tractors which are used for everything around the farm.
